text: 'ina 'awhayna 'iilayk -ayha alrswl- btblygh alrisalat kama 'awhayna 'iilaa nuh walnabiiyn min bedh, wa'awhayna 'iilaa 'iibrahim wa'iismaeil wa'iishaq wayaequb wal'asbat -whm al'anbia' aldhyn kanuu fi qabayil bani 'iisrayiyl alathnty eshrt min walad yeqwb- waeisaa wa'ayuwb wayunus waharun wslyman. watayna dawud zbwrana, wahu kitab wshf mktwbt
